DriverDocumentation.Name: onrack
DriverDocumentation.Description: A project for creating a service driver. These drivers can be attached to services and used to execute the driver commands. Service drivers are useful for exposing automation to end users.

Parameter.Name: resource
Parameter.Description: A predefined matrix with the following columns: attribute, mandatory / optional (empty is mandatory), value - this column will be automatically populated when executing the command.
Parameter.DefaultValue: {['ResourceName','','';'ResourceFullName','','';'ResourceFamily','','';'ResourceModel','','';'ResourceDescription','','';'ESX Gateway','','';'ESX Domain','','';'ESX DNS1','','';'ESX DNS2','','';'ESX Root Password','','';'OnRack Address','','';'OnRack Username','','';'OnRack Password','','';'DeployTable','','']}

Parameter.Name: reservation
Parameter.Description: A predefined matrix with the following columns: attribute, mandatory / optional (empty is mandatory), value - this column will be automatically populated when executing the command.

Parameter.Name: connectors
Parameter.Description: List of connectors that are connected to the resource

Parameter.Name: connectorsAttributes
Parameter.Description: List of attributes for the connectors

Parameter.Name: resource
Parameter.Description: A predefined matrix with the following columns: attribute, mandatory / optional (empty is mandatory), value - this column will be automatically populated when executing the command.

Parameter.Name: reservation
Parameter.Description: A predefined matrix with the following columns: attribute, mandatory / optional (empty is mandatory), value - this column will be automatically populated when executing the command.

Parameter.Name: connectors
Parameter.Description: List of connectors that are connected to the resource

Parameter.Name: connectorsAttributes
Parameter.Description: List of attributes for the connectors

Function.Name: EndSession
Function.Description: This function is called (automatically by the server) only once when the driver is going to be unloaded. Use this function to close any open sessions, saving states and any information that might be needed for the next executions of the driver commands (these can be loaded again in the Init function).

Function.Name: Init
Function.Description: This function is called (automatically by the server) only once when the driver is being loaded for the first time. This function will not get information on a specific reservation so make sure to only do initialization tasks in this function that are cross reservations. When several resources are using the same driver, the Init function will be called for each one of them when the driver will be used for the first time or after an idle time.

Parameter.Name: resource
Parameter.Description: A predefined matrix with the following columns: attribute, mandatory / optional (empty is mandatory), value - this column will be automatically populated when executing the command.

Parameter.Name: connectivityInfo
Parameter.Description: A predefined matrix with the following columns: parameter, mandatory / optional (empty is mandatory), value - this column will be automatically populated when executing the command.

Function.Name: ResetDriver
Function.Description: This function is being called when the user/admin selects to reset the driver. This function can be used to close open sessions or clear any saved values, and then call the Init function to start over again.

Parameter.Name: resource
Parameter.Description: A predefined matrix with the following columns: attribute, mandatory / optional (empty is mandatory), value - this column will be automatically populated when executing the command.

Parameter.Name: connectivityInfo
Parameter.Description: A predefined matrix with the following columns: parameter, mandatory / optional (empty is mandatory), value - this column will be automatically populated when executing the command.

Parameter.Name: MAC
Parameter.Description: Deploy on a host with the provided MAC address. Use either this option or the OnRackID option.
